021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
023
024import java.util.Locale;
025import java.util.Optional;
026
027/**
028 * Represents a {@link Currency currency} that is represented by physical items in game.
029 *
030 * @author creatorfromhell
031 * @see Currency
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public class ItemCurrency extends Currency {
035
036  protected boolean enderChest;
037  protected boolean enderFill;
038  protected boolean importItem;
039  protected boolean blockCraft;
040
041  public ItemCurrency(final String identifier) {
042
043    super(identifier);
044
045    this.enderChest = true;
046    this.enderFill = true;
047    this.importItem = true;
048    this.blockCraft = false;
049  }
050
051  public Optional<ItemDenomination> getDenominationByMaterial(final String material) {
052
053    for(final Denomination denom : getDenominations().values()) {
054
055      final ItemDenomination item = (ItemDenomination)denom;
056
057      if(item.material().equalsIgnoreCase(material)
058         || item.material().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).contains(material.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT))
059         || material.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).contains(item.material().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT))) {
060        return Optional.of(item);
061      }
062    }
063    return Optional.empty();
064  }
065
066  public boolean canEnderChest() {
067
068    return enderChest;
069  }
070
071  public void setEnderChest(final boolean enderChest) {
072
073    this.enderChest = enderChest;
074  }
075
076  public boolean isEnderFill() {
077
078    return enderFill;
079  }
080
081  public void setEnderFill(final boolean enderFill) {
082
083    this.enderFill = enderFill;
084  }
085
086  public boolean isImportItem() {
087
088    return importItem;
089  }
090
091  public void setImportItem(final boolean importItem) {
092
093    this.importItem = importItem;
094  }
095
096  public boolean blockCraft() {
097
098    return blockCraft;
099  }
100
101  public void blockCraft(final boolean blockCraft) {
102
103    this.blockCraft = blockCraft;
104  }
105}
